page.title: 09LANDSCAPE AND FARMLAND
page.content: The general character of the land in this area is flat or gently undulating.The land is used mostly for crop-growing,the soil being a workable clay mixture.Most of the farmland is owned by a few landowners and there are also a number of tenant farmers. Because of the few landowners owning most of the land there are quite a few farmhouses that are let privately and take no part in the farming of the surrounding land. Also a large proportion of the{ {Castle Grounds}is used as tenanted farmland. In the south-western section of the grid,land is being used increasingly for extractive purposes, such as gravel,sand and clay.
